alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 03 at 5:22PM PST until January 04 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Medford OR has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Oregon... Deer Creek at Roseburg affecting Central Douglas County zone. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Deer Creek at Roseburg. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 PM PST Monday the stage was 6.8 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached based on the latest forecast information. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday afternoon at 400 PM PST.
